metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16119 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Fresh is a module used by the Express.js framework for HTTP response freshness testing. It is vulnerable to a regular expression denial of service when it is passed specially crafted input to parse. This causes the event loop to be blocked causing a denial of service condition.

criterions.comment: node-fresh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
